name: VRoom VRoom Taco
description:
Description

Speed, precision, nachos. These are some of the things you'll need to make it in the fast-paced world of mobile meal delivery. Play as the owner of a taco truck  filling out orders for highway traffickers on the go. Keep your wits about you as you juggle crafting delicious tacos, managing the occasional bump in the road, and catching that sweet sweet cash when it comes you way. Welcome to the world of VRoom VRoom Taco!

This game was developed during and following Global Game Jam 2020.

This game works only on the Oculus Rift, Oculus Rift S, and Oculus Quest.

Game Instructions
  • Use grip buttons to grab objects and interact with the environment
  • Scoop up taco meat with the ladles
  • Grab other ingredients from fridge
    • To cut up into servable pieces use the knife or place into ingredient tray
  • Place ingredients into taco shell in sequence according to order
  • Place chips in bowl
    • Use one handful of chips and some cheese to make nachos
  • Catch incoming cash from successful orders and place into register for profit
Credits

  • Mitchell 'Well' Dunning - Modeling, Programming
  • Blaine 'Krispy' Carrick - Programming, Music
  • Jackson 'Brioche' Bostian - Design
  • Alberto 'Drumstick' Carrillo - Modeling, Programming
  • Ben 'Spicy' Johnson - Programming
  • Karthik 'Grill Marks' Chandran - Texturing
  • Nico 'Nacho' Kehn - Programming
